columns.blockSubtitle: We're Here for You! Now Working from Home
description: Our team has been following social distancing guidelines and has shifted to remote work without skipping a beat. Many of our team members worked hard this weekend to continue posting your COVID-19 updates!
Sheba misses her office peeps and puppy pals but she and her family are staying home to help flatten the curve. She can still do her favorite thing- nap!
